vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
υἱο-θεσία, ἡ,
adoption as a son, [Refs 2nd c.BC+]; in a religious sense, πνεῦμα υἱοθεσίας [NT]; frequently in Inscrr., in the phrase καθ᾽ υἱοθεσίαν, [Refs 2nd c.BC+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: adoption as sons, sonship; in NT culture a son received greater inheritance and honor, but in Christ men and women inherit equally
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
adoption as sons, sonship; in NT culture a son received greater inheritance and honor, but in Christ men and women inherit equally
adoption, a placing in the condition of a son, Rom. 8:15, 23; 9:4; Gal. 4:5; Eph. 1:5*
